```{r}
#vector
vectorExample <- c("2020-03-31T13:40:55Z", "一芳", "2", "水果茶")

library(lubridate)
`小明交易1` <- list(
  ymd_hms("2020-03-31T13:40:55Z"), # Date/Time class
  "一芳", # character
  2, # numeric
  "水果茶" # character
)
print(vectorExample)
print(`小明交易1`)
```
